name: A name for Paper NFT could be - e.g. Paper Title
description: A description about Paper provided by PaperScore
image: A URI pointing to a resource with mime type image/* representing the asset to which this token represents. Consider making any images at a width between 320 and 1080 pixels and aspect ratio between 1.91:1 and 4:5 inclusive. https://s3.amazonaws.com/your-bucket/images/{id}.png
